title: What is the meaning of the lyrics of the song 'Sargi' by Amrinder Gill from the movie Tu Mera 22 Main Tera 22? - Quora

response.answer_text: The time before “Dawn” it is so in Punjabi language word “Dhami” is used for dawn,in Arabic language word “Subh Kazib” is used for “Sargi” means false morning and dawn is called “Subh Sadiq” means true morning. In the month of Ramzan(the month of fasting), the Muslim are allowed drinking and eating before dawn, a meal is had at this time and also called “Sargi” in Punjabi language.
